hsrt.mec.controldeveloper.core.com.command

Interface IDirection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICommand

    public interface IDirection
extends ICommand
    Interface IDirection defines the interface for a direction command, i.e. the degree, in which the mobile device shall be turned.

    This interface is used for evaluation and execution of concrete commands, e.g. in ComHandler.
    See Also:
    ComHandler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDegree()
      Returns the degree of a direction command, in which the mobile device shall be turned.
